OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenseCapitalizationToDeferredAcqu.label: Other Expense, Capitalization to Deferred Acquisition Cost (DAC) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherExpenseCapitalizationToDeferredAcqu.description: Represents the total amount of operating expenses resulting from the amortization or adjustments of amounts capitalized as deferred policy acquisition costs.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

OtherPolicyholderFunds.label: Other Policyholder Funds
OtherPolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, Additional Credit Losses
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, No Previous Impairment
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Cash Flows
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held due to increases in cash flows expected to be collected and recognized over the remaining life of the security.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Change in Status
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the amount of cumulative losses recognized in earnings for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) for which a portion of the impairment had been recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity) due to a change in status of the impaired security because of a change in the entity's intent to either sell the impaired security or it has become more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the security before recovery of its cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Securities Sold
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security because of the sale of impaired securities during the period.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment losses on investments in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale which have been recognized in earnings during the period. Such impairment losses consist of other than temporary impairments (OTTI) on equity securities, credit losses on investments in debt securities, and when the entity intends to sell an impaired debt security or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the impaired debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.label: Participating Insurance, Percentage of Gross Insurance in Force
ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.description: Percentage of participating insurance contract to insurance contracts in force.

PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.label: Payments for Advance to Affiliate
PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.description: The cash outflow from advancing money to an affiliate (an entity that is related but not strictly controlled by the entity).

PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid
PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrum.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Derivative Instrument, Financing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrum.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Policy Loans
PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans.description: Net amount paid or received by the entity associated with issuance or collection of loans made to policy holders, principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Short-term Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgree.label: Payments for Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
PaymentsForSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgree.description: The cash outflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities, because they are not classified as trading securities.

PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.label: Payments to Acquire Limited Partnership Interests
PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstate.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans.label: Payments to Fund Policy Loans
PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans.description: The initial funding or additional funding of loans receivable to policy holders principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Direct
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.description: Amount, before effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderContractDeposits.label: Policyholder Contract Deposit
PolicyholderContractDeposits.description: Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet.label: Premiums and Other Receivables, Net
PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of allowance for doubtful accounts, of all premiums and other types of receivables due from other persons or entities.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce.label: Premiums, Net, Life Insurance in Force (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life insurance in force premiums.

PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.label: SEC Schedule, 12-17, Insurance Companies, Reinsurance, Premium, Percentage Assumed to Net
PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.description: Percentage of assumed premium earned to premium earned after effects of reinsurance, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits asset (also known as value of business acquired).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: The amount of the present value of future profits asset that was amortized during the period, generally in proportion to related revenue earned, estimated gross profits, or over the customer relationship or some other period.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Realized Gain (Loss)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from realized investment gain (loss).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Five
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Four
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year One
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Three
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Two
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Investment Gains (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.description: Amount of the increase in the period in the present value of future profits asset attributable to unrealized investment gains.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertif.label: Proceeds from Annuities and Investment Certificates
ProceedsFromAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertif.description: The cash inflow from an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffilia.label: Proceeds from Collection of Advance to Affiliate
ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffilia.description: The cash inflow from the collection of money previously advanced to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLoansReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLoansReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection, including prepayments, of loans receivable issued for financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Parent
ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses, Net of Cash Divested
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.label: Proceeds from Limited Partnership Investments
ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.description: Cash inflow received as distributions, returns of capital, or sale proceeds from partnership interests held for investment purposes.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromRealEstateAndRealEstateJoint.label: Proceeds from Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
ProceedsFromRealEstateAndRealEstateJoint.description: The cash inflow from the sale of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Mortgage Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfInsuranceInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Insurance Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfInsuranceInvestments.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of insurance policy investment assets during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgre.label: Proceeds from Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
ProceedsFromSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgre.description: The cash inflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, before Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, Net of Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Tax
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss).

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed.

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Ceded
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Assumed from Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums assumed from other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Ceded to Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums ceded to other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Gross Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Net Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Net amount of gross premiums, less premiums ceded to other companies, plus premiums assumed from other companies; which represents the net amount of premium revenue on the income statement.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Percentage of Amount Assumed to Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Percentage of amount of premiums assumed from other companies to net amount of premiums.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueFromAffiliatesC.label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due from Affiliates, Current
RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueFromAffiliatesC.description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due from affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFrom.label: Related Party Transaction, Other Revenues from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFrom.description: Reflects the sum of all other revenue and income realized from sales and other transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party during the period.

RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.label: Repayment of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertif.label: Repayments of Annuities and Investment Certificates
RepaymentsOfAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertif.description: The cash outflow for an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevenuesFromExternalCustomers.label: Revenue from External Customers (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RevenuesFromExternalCustomers.description: Amount of revenue from external customers for the reportable segment. Such disclosure is presented if the amount is: (a) included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettin.label: Securities Loaned, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettin.description: Amount of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral.label: Securities Received as Collateral
SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the assets received as collateral against securities loaned to other broker-dealers. Borrowers of securities generally are required to provide collateral to the lenders of securities, commonly cash but sometimes other securities or standby letters of credit, with a value slightly higher than that of the securities borrowed. In instances where the entity is permitted to sell or re-pledge these securities, the entity reports the fair value of the collateral received and the related obligation to return the collateral as a liability.

SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralAmountRepl.label: Securities Received as Collateral, Amount Repledged and Sold
SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralAmountRepl.description: The fair value of collateral received that has been sold or re-pledged and is owed to the debtor (transferor) upon settlement of the related contractual obligation under which it was received.

SecuritizationFinancialAssetForWhichTran.label: Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Financial Asset for which Transfer is Accounted as Sale, Gain (Loss) on Sale
SecuritizationFinancialAssetForWhichTran.description: Reflects, by transferred financial asset type, the amount of sales proceeds in excess of or deficient from the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs, including those transactions in which the seller/transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Fair Value
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Fair value of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Current Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Prior Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred in prior reporting periods and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Operating Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.description: Amount of operating expense classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Written
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount, after premiums ceded and assumed, of premium written, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Unearned Premium
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TransferMortgagePayable.label: Transfer Mortgage Payable
TransferMortgagePayable.description: The fair value of transfer of mortgage payable in noncash investing or financing activities.

TransferOfInvestments.label: Transfer from Investments
TransferOfInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

TransferOfOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer from Real Estate Owned
TransferOfOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred out of real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TransfersAccountedForAsSecuredBorrowings.label: Transfers Accounted for as Secured Borrowings, Associated Liabilities, Carrying Amount
TransfersAccountedForAsSecuredBorrowings.description: Carrying amount of liabilities associated with financial assets accounted for as secured borrowings recognized in the transferor's statement of financial position at the end of each period presented.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityFinancialOrOtherSu.label: Variable Interest Entity, Financial or Other Support, Amount
VariableInterestEntityFinancialOrOtherSu.description: The amount of financial or other support the reporting entity has provided (explicitly or implicitly) to the Variable Interest Entity (VIE) that it was not previously contractually required to provide or that the reporting entity intends to provide, including, for example, situations in which the reporting entity assisted the VIE in obtaining another type of support.

VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.description: Carrying amount of the assets in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.description: Carrying amount of the liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.description: Amount, before allocation of a valuation allowances, of deferred tax assets attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards including, but not limited to, research, foreign, general business, alternative minimum tax, and other deductible tax credit carryforwards.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsOtherComprehensiveLoss.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other Comprehensive Loss
DeferredTaxAssetsOtherComprehensiveLoss.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses in other comprehensive income.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsDom.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Domestic, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsDom.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to domestic income tax settlement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsOth.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Other, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxSettlementsOth.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Short-term Investments
PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments.description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyExcessRetentio.label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Excess Retention, Percentage
ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyExcessRetentio.description: Percentage of risk reinsured in excess of stated retention per entity policy.

ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyReinsuredRiskP.label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Reinsured Risk, Percentage
ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyReinsuredRiskP.description: Percentage of risk reinsured on insurance products per entity policy.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.
